text:
+++ This bug was initially created as a clone of Bug #42637 +++

I am able to get successful responses for POST method SOAP/XML-RPC requests & am able to automate it. 

But PUT method is not working as POST method is hard-coded. This is blocking 

Kindly provide me fix or any workaround to automate PUT method SOAP/XML-RPC requests. Or else Please let me know if this works in latest versions like 2.6 version, so that I can install it.

Thanks & Regards,
Phani.
creator: phanikrishna.chirala@bt.com

text:
This is not a bug but an enhancement request already existing.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of bug 42637 ***
creator: p.mouawad@ubik-ingenierie.com
phanikrishna.chirala@bt.com
text:
Hi,

Thanks a lot for quick reply.

Could you please let me know the tentative date & version in which the enhancement request be processed? I will keep my work pending and wait in accordance with that.

Thanks & Regards,
Phani.

It is possible to do this using HTTP Sampler + Put Method + Raw Post body.
So implementing it in SOAP/XML-RPC request is not necessary
creator: p.mouawad@ubik-ingenierie.com
